entities.name: syllabary

relationships.description: Harry is asking Hermione about Ancient Runes.
Harry is comparing the symbol to a picture in the syllabary.
Hermione has knowledge about Ancient Runes.
Harry is connecting the symbol to Luna's dad.
Harry identifies the symbol as Grindelwald's mark.
